title: Serve Plex Media to Legacy Devices Via DLNA ! No Plex Client Required!
description:
Sign up for a Plex Pass: http://lon.tv/plexpass - If you have older TVs or media players kicking around you can browse and play media without a Plex client app using the decades-old DLNA standard. Plex still supports DLNA and provides a lot of meta data from your server to make the browsing experience more efficient. See more Plex : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIvqJPAmMooCKOHieLdi3I7o and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

DLNA Profile Instructions (for transcoding) : https://lon.tv/9fxnk

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
01:08 - Setup
02:34 - TV and Movies Browsing
06:27 - Photos
06:58 - Music
08:24 - Transcoding
09:25 - Conclusion
